name: mapval
params: setvar s0, class c0, class c1
body: |- wceq(co(c0, cmap, c1), cab(s0, wf(cv(s0), c1, c0)))

stmt.origin: mp2an(wceq(co(c0, cmap, c1), cab(s0, wf(cv(s0), c1, c0))), wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe))

body.origin:
|- wceq(co(c0, cmap, c1), cab(s0, wf(cv(s0), c1, c0)))
-| wcel(c0, universe)
-| wcel(c1, universe)
-| wi(wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe)), wceq(co(c0, cmap, c1), cab(s0, wf(cv(s0), c1, c0))))

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(co(c0, cmap, c1), cab(s0, wf(cv(s0), c1, c0)))
-| wcel(c0, universe)
-| wcel(c1, universe)
-| wi(wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe)), wceq(co(c0, cmap, c1), cab(s0, wf(cv(s0), c1, c0))))

body.origin:
|- wi(wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe)), wceq(co(c0, cmap, c1), cab(s0, wf(cv(s0), c1, c0))))
-| diffsc(s0, c0)
-| diffsc(s0, c1)

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(co(c0, cmap, c1), cab(s0, wf(cv(s0), c1, c0)))
-| wcel(c0, universe)
-| wcel(c1, universe)
-| diffsc(s0, c0)
-| diffsc(s0, c1)

comment: The value of set exponentiation (inference version). ` ( A ^m B ) ` is the set of all functions that map from ` B ` to ` A ` . Definition 10.24 of [Kunen] p. 24. (Contributed by NM, 8-Dec-2003.)
